original_text: Our leaders are fools. They do not ask the Lord for his advice. So they have failed to take care of us, and all their people have disappeared. 10: Judah's leaders are called shepherds. The people that they should take care of are like their sheep. Our leaders are fools. They do not ask the Lord for his advice. So they have failed to take care of us, and all their people have disappeared. 10: Judah's leaders are called shepherds. The people that they should take care of are like their sheep. Our leaders are fools.
korean_text: 목자들은 어리석어 여호와를 찾지 아니하므로 형통하지 못하며 그 모든 양 떼는 흩어졌도다

sentences.original_text: They do not ask the Lord for his advice.
So they have failed to take care of us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 우리를 돌보는 데 실패했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and all their people have disappeared.
The people that they should take care of
